abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32645174, pmid32773245, pmid32706959, pmid32933562, pmid32940326, pmid32936467, pmid32706952, pmid32936212, pmid32894160, pmid32706958
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.22
